channel.title: Need help with making a server (for Windows 7)
channel.description:
Well, so far i have YET to find a topic on how to make a server, just for Windows 7. I'm having troubles on connecting me to my server, even when the IP is on 0.0.0.0.
So.. does anyone have a link to a topic about it JUST for Windows 7?
If not, can you tell me how to please? :[
